errors.message: Component 'name' values (PascalCase) do not consistently match initialization_graph node 'id' values (snake_case). Downstream wiring may fail unless a mapping is provided.

Entrypoint init_params reference components using 'component' names (e.g., 'JsonSerializer') while initialization_graph uses instance ids (e.g., 'json_serializer'). Consider using consistent instance ids or adding explicit mapping.

summary: Manifest is structurally valid; 2 warnings about inconsistent component naming/reference styles that may affect wiring.
